description:
It`s all because of your mother.
Chihiro can`t stop thinking about what Yuri said to him. Do they have something to do with the lost memories of his childhood?
The past Kakihara describes to Chihiro is a heartbreaking tragedy.
Inuki desperately tries to save Chihiro as he despairs at his bloody fate.
Will they be able to change their destinies?
Just when he thinks he`s found a glimmer of hope, Inuki is visited by his own terrifying tragedy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyou no Kurai Unmei wa, Konosaki Zutto Tarekomeru
L`ombre de la fatalité plane sur l`avenir
Today`s Dark Destiny Will Hang over the Future
今日の暗い運命は, この先ずっと垂れ込める
